reviews.comments: Excelente todo! Lo recomiendo 100%.
El depto está muy bueno. Al ser loft, tiene el texto alto, es todo ventanal a la calle, muy lindo. Queda a 3 cuadras del subte D, excelente ubicación, el barrio es genial.

El departamento era muy lindo,espacioso para dos personas,todos los servicios funcionaron a la perfección, la cama era muy comoda,la mesa grande,y la ducha, con una presión de agua re linda,la voy a extrañar.Todas las noches fuimos caminando hasta la zona de los restaurantes más concurridos(a 4 cuadras aprox)Sobre un radio de dos cuadras teníamos todo cerca(farmacia,panadería,carga de tarjeta sube,verduleria,market,tintoreria,bar,etc).A dos cuadras hay una gran cantidad de colectivos que conectan con toda la ciudad,y el subte esta a 3 cuadras.Lo que más me gustó, poder dormir tranquila,puesto que los colectivos no pasan sobre esta calle,y eso es importante en Capital. Incluso nos dejaron una sube (forma de pago electrónico para medios de transporte en la ciudad)para usar que fue muy útil en el viaje.

Nos recibieron con una botella de vino y copas.Emmanuel y su cuñada no tuvieron problemas en recibirnos super temprano,por la llegada de nuestro vuelo.Nos encantó todo y estamos agradecidos de la predisposición que sentimos por parte de nuestro anfitrión. Seguramente volveremos a hospedarnos allí.Es un lugar excelente para tu estadía en Buenos Aires.
Muy comunicativo, me hizo todo muy simple. Llegamos tarde y nos estaban esperando. El departamento esta muy bien ubicado. Tiene todo lo que necesites, hasta un celular para los extranjeros!!!
Muy lindo loft, y muy amables. Luminoso, alegre, cómodo y muy bien ubicado.  Emmanuel fue muy atento . Muy recomendable!

El departamento es muy lindo, luminoso y con muy buena ubicación. Con todo lo necesario para estar cómodos. Emmanuel fue muy amable, dispuesto y flexible con los horarios. Definitivamente muy recomendable.

Emmanuel tiene el balance de atención justo. Está cuando lo necesitas y te deja manejarte con total libertad cuando uno no necesita de su presencia o ayuda. El Barrio es genial como no podría ser de otra manera.
El lugar era para mi jefe que debia venir a BsAs y quedo muy conforme con todo!!
Emmanuel fue un gran anfitrión para nuestros huéspedes. Un placer trabajar con él. Super recomendado.
Excelente lugar!! 100% recomendable!

El departamento es tan lindo como se ve en las fotos. Es muy cómodo, amplio y luminoso. Todo funciona perfectamente. El departamento está rodeado de lugares para desayunar y comer; y sin duda el barrio es uno de los más lindos de Buenos Aires. Emmanuel estuvo siempre al pendiente y fue muy amable en todo momento. La próxima vez que visitemos Buenos aires pensamos regresar ya que pasamos una estadía espectacular.  Lo recomiendo ampliamente.
Apartamento super recomendable, excelente ubicación, ideal para parejas. Todo super cómodo.
Recomendado 100 % muy bien ubicado, con muchos swrvicios cerca, particularmente transporte, supermatkwr, lavandería? Restaurantes, iglesia? Genial nos encantó su ventanal , su luz natural, muy lindo
Todo perfecto, limpieza, ubicacion, comodidad, etc.. Excelente la predisposición de Emanuel para recibirme, resolviendo todo rápidamente. Muy recomendable!

Contratamos este hospedaje el mismo día de entrada, muy a última hora. Aún así, Emmanuel nos brindó todo el apoyo que necesitamos, y el sitio estuvo perfecto para nuestro ingreso. Tuvimos un completo set de instrucciones , teléfono celular, internet, y hasta una botella de vino!  Las recomendaciones de restaurantes en la zona de Emmanuel fueron impecables.  Como nota adicional , dejamos algunos documentos en la cajilla de seguridad, y Emmanuel nos apoyó para que éstos nos llegaran a Colombia en poco tiempo.   Muy recomendado!
Todo excelente, bien ubicado y prolijo.  Gracias!

El apartamento es excelente muy bonito en una calle llena de arboles a 3 cuadras de una plaza comercial completisima.

Yo en esta ocasion olvide el pasaporte en el apartamento y Emanuel me lo fue a dejar en su carro a donde me estaba quedando despues !! Un tipazo super amable y agradable... Su amabilidad y comprension me salvaron.

El apartamento tiene de todo, es un loft moderno genial para alguien que va solo o en pareja. La ubicacion... De lo mejor donde he estado.

Increíble el departamento, amplio y bien iluminado, al momento de la entrega todo estaba limpio y ordenado. Fueron puntuales con la entrega de las llaves y excelente recibimiento. Totalmente recomendable.

gracias por todo, emmanuel!
todo perfecto.
hasta pronto.

Departamento tal como se indica en la publicación, buena ubicacion a menos de 5 minutos del subte. 

Tiene lo necesario para una buena estadia, la cocina y el baño tienen de todo. Además, se deja a disposicion una guia con información basica y Emmanuel siempre esta a disponible cualquier duda.

La experiencia fue sin inconvenientes y con eso me refiero e ningún problema con la recepción, estadía y salida. Cuando llegamos Geraldine no estaba esperando con las llaves, el departamento estaba limpio (muy importante), cocina, baños, dormitorio... además un vituperio de bienvenida que nos alegro la llegada. El barrio es muy tranquilo incluso estando tan cerca de Av. Santa Fe (1 cuadra), muy cercano al subte y transporte público. Los restoranes y bares recomendados por amigos estaban a distancia caminable. La salida fue sin ningún problema. Recomendado 100%

El apartamento es tal cual aparece en la foto.
He logrado disfrutar de unos dias magnificos y Emanuel ha estado dispuesto para ayudarme en cualquier momento.
El apto esta al lado de dos estaciones de metro. El barrio Palermo, esta lleno de bares, restarants y buen ambiente.
Sin duda, repetiria mi experriencia.
todo perfecto. location genial. muy luminoso. limpio, cuidado y moderno

El barrio es excelente para pasar buenos días en Buenos Aires, cerca del metro que conecta con el centro y en el barrio de Palermo, que no le hace falta nada. El departamento excelente. No tengo ninguna queja al respecto.
Todo perfecto, muy buen departamento, atención, zona, todo muy bien, muy buena experiencia

Todo 10 puntos.  Me esperó a la hora acordada en el departamento, y fue súper amable con todo. 
El departamento está muy bien, en una muy buena zona.
Muy confiable y recomendable!
Seguramente vuelva!

El departamento es muy acogedor, moderno, limpio e iluminado.
Realmente fue una muy grata experiencia de principio a fin. Una excelente ubicación. Completamente recomendable.

Nuestra estancia en el departamento fue increible, para mi gusto es mucho mejor que un hotel. Emmanuel siempre respondió nuestras dudas, llegamos y todo estaba limpio, fueron siempre muy amables y pudimos pasar unos buenos días. El departamento es muy lindo, esta bien equipado, y las cosas funcionan. Recomendamos totalmente este lugar!

Nuestra estadía en Buenos Aires estuvo absolutamente perfecta!! El duplex de Emmanuel es verdaderamente cómodo, está muy bien equipado (hasta celular nos dejó) y es muy seguro. La ubicación es perfecta, ya que en pocas cuadras encontramos supermercados, bancos y una estación de metro (subte). 
El anfitrión es muy amable, cordial y tiene la mejor de las disposiciones. Muy recomendable!!

Si usted está pensando en ir a Buenos Aires y en busca de un lugar cerca de todo, con mucho más comodidad y privacidad que un hotel, la estancia en el apartamento de Emmanuel. Porque además de ser un excelente inmóvil, muy bien ubicado, el dueño es muy amable y servicial, como pocos en el mundo. El único problema es que seguramente no querrá irse. El deseo de vivir allí. La ubicación es excelente, a pie para ir a la GreenBamboo, Oui Oui a esto y también muy cerca de muchos otros puntos. Lo recomiendo, muy mucho!!!

Muy lindo departamento, cumple con todo lo que uno necesita en su estadia y esta muy cerca de los mejores sitios de Buenos Aires, Emmanuel es un lujo de anfitrion. 

felicitaciones!!!

We had an amazing experience at Emmanuel´s apartment! It was exactly what we were looking for: a well located, nice looking, comfortable apartment to spend a month in Palermo @ Buenos Aires. The area is super safe and the apartment is beautiful, filled with light and super warm. The host was super accommodating to all of our needs. Thank you for a great stay!
We had a great stay at Emmanuel’s! He was responsive and the place was in a great location.

Emmanuel's place is everything you need in a great neighbourhood and would definitely stay there again. I loved everything about it!
And Buenos Aires is just stunning, a perfect experience!!!

Really lovely apartment in a great area, leafy, safe and well located for exploring local cafes and bars with good links to the centre. Emmanuel was a great host, very responsive with some good recommendations (definitely try Sudestada) and he helped us out when our next flight was cancelled with a flexible check out and advice on finding a new place as his was booked - this was much appreciated. Would definitely stay here again - thanks!

Great spot in a great neighborhood. Perfect for one person or a couple. Had everything I needed at my fingertips and check in check out was so smooth. I will absolutely be staying here again if available!
It was a pleasant stay at Emmanuel's appartement. If we come ever back we would stay at the same place if avaiable.

Great location - perfect apartment for a "home-base."  We stayed at Emmanuel's place for 8 nights during a recent trip to Buenos Aires.  The apartment is simple, but well furnished.  It is comfortable, but not extravaganent.  We spent most of the time out and about, so it was the perfect spot for us.  It is centrally located, near a subway line, and a ton of restaurants.  Emmanuel was super communicative and our check-in was really simple (they even gave us a bottle of wine!).  We would stay in his apartment again in a heart-beat.  Thank you!

Emmanuel is a great host, he was present and responsive to our needs, and flexible about check-in and out times. The apartment features a land line, cell phone, wi-fi, and a safe box. The balcony is perfect for breakfast, and the location is excellent!

Emmanuel was very responsive to each inquiry we had, both before and during our stay, though we did not meet in person. We loved his Palermo Hollywood apartment; cool loft with lots of natural light on the top floor of the small apartment building. The neighborhood is also terrific as its a short 1 block walk from Santa Fe Ave as well as lots of the Palermo Hollywood night life.
I really enjoyed my time staying there. It's a very nice and comfortable duplex located in a cool area. I would definitely recommend!

Very pleasant place close to the Distrito Arcos and the nice cafés and shops of Palermo. You can start the day with a breakfast on the balcony sitting in the top of the plane trees. It's luminous and more spacious as we expected. The perfect choice for or our stay in Buenos Aires!
Emmanuel's place is beautiful. Great location, great value, would stay here again!
The pictures do not do this apartment justice. Great location, beautiful and quiet building. Worth every penny.
My second stay in this appartement. Perfect location. Close to all public transports.
The place and location are perfect but it is VERY noisy due to the neighbors (even after 24.00)

I absolutely loved my stay here! The location is wonderful - super close to the train, subte, and busses which makes getting around really easy. It's also very close to laundry and at least 6 or 7 grocery stores including a dietetica and fruit/vegetable stands. The apartment had lots of thoughtful touches as well: an adapter for devices, a fully equipped kitchen, and truly anything I could need. Emmanuel was also very responsive when I had questions. Would highly recommend!

The apartment is lovely - clean, practical and with generous little touches like a bottle of wine and mineral water on arrival.

Emmanuel was a great host with quick communication and was really flexible to meet with us on arrival.

If you want a nice apartment in trendy Palermo, I would highly recommend this apartment. The wifi worked brilliantly, had super-hot showers, we had so many great restaurants close by (Emmanuel recommended fabulous places!) and with the only difficulty to sleep late being the noise from other apartments, otherwise the location is quite peaceful and we felt very safe at all times.

Thanks for your hospitality Emmanuel.

Dear Fellow Travelers, 

This was our 1st Airbnb experience and it was great. Much of what I have to say here echoes other reviews. 

From the initial contact, Emmanuel was responsive, helpful and kind, (this continued to be true throughout our stay) answering all of our questions.  The booking process for the apartment was very easy, and Emmanuel was very accommodating  about check-in and check-out times.  He truly was a great person to introduce us to Airbnb.  And we feel fortunate to have had this experience.

When we arrived, Carolina was waiting for us, welcomed us, answered any questions we had and showed us the "ins and outs".  She was lovely. The "helpful hints information sheet" that Emmanuel had made was  useful, especially, for us, the restaurant and taxi recommendations.

The apartment was as shown, though I have to say, the quality of light there is much more luminous and beautiful than the photos are able to express.  The couch is different from the one shown and a bit more funky, though it looks as if it could be converted into a bed.  Internet, phone, TV all worked very well. The bed was comfortable, the water pressure and hot water suburb.

We stayed for 11 days.  The location is very convenient.  There is easy access to groceries, transportation, pharmacy, restaurants, mobil services, art supplies - even organic produce (a rarity) which gets delivered to a small store on Fridays at the corner of Bompland and either Guatemala or Soler.  

The neighborhood is really alive with people, and it always felt safe, (although we were not out really late, so I don't have direct experience of early morning hours). 

I would add two more things:
If you happen to have environment sensitivities, the detergent that Emmanuel had been using at the time of this review for sheets and towels, has a strong and pervasive scent. 
And, even though it is on the fourth floor, the balcony door is not lockable, (this is on purpose, so folks don't lock themselves outside). Both of these things have easy solutions: (unscented detergent, and a stick the width of the jam so that the sliding door can be blocked from the inside), and I have made them to Emmanuel. So these two issues may be different in the future.

I feel completely comfortable recommending Emmanuel and his apartment.

Alison

Notre séjour s'est très bien déroulé grâce au joli logement d'Emmanuel.
Les voisins étaient charmants ( nous offrant des fruits à notre arrivée ) et le gardien très gentil ( soucieux de notre bien être, et nous réservant un taxi pour notre retour ), tout comme Emmanuel qui nous a laissé un téléphone portable pour le joindre à tout moment et une bouteille de vin en guise de bienvenue. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié cet appartement confortable et lumineux avec sa large terrasse, et très bien situé dans un quartier agréable ( présence de nombreux restaurants, boutiques, bars, stations de bus et métro... ). C'est une adresse que l'on recommande vivement...
Great location. Nice clean apartment. Very nice to have a bottle of wine waiting for me when I arrived :)

Great experience! Clean, beautiful, good security. Never met Emmanuel (was greeted by his sister in law, super friendly and helpful) but was in contact frequently and he was very helpful in recommending places to eat, taxis to take, etc. Had a great time!

I stayed a few days in Emmanuel's studio flat and I had a very nice time there. The flat is comfortable and a perfect place to come back to after having spent the day exploring Bs As. Booking and correspondence, as well as checking in and out, was without any complications - all very easy. I have no trouble recommending Emmanuel's place.
The room was cozy and comfortable.  Geraldin was very kind and the  summarized information on the table was very useful. Emmanuel also helped me to call a taxi when I checked out.  Good experience~

From the checkin to the check out: Everything went very smoothly. IT is close to the Metro (Subte) and all the cool bars in Palermo are in walking distance too.

The Apartment has plenty of sun and the balcony is perfect for a glass of wine.
A very good apartment for spending a good time in Buenos Aires

My boyfriend and I reserved Emmanuel's place for 8 nights in February 2016. 

It is located in a very secure building on a quiet side street, just one block off of a major street. There is a locked front vestibule and an elevator to the apartment itself.

We never met Emmanuel, but we communicated through (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) while we were in town and he was very helpful to us. We don't speak Spanish so he helped us make a reservation for Salon Canning, a really wonderful tango milonga. He left us fresh towels when we asked for them. He was also very helpful in coordinating a reasonably-priced driver to take us back to the airport at the end of our stay. (Allow three hours like he recommends!) 

The location is really wonderful. It's about a 5-minute walk from the Ministro Carranza Station on the Green "D" line. The "D" line makes it very easy to get all over Buenos Aires. 

The apartment is in a great area called "Palermo" which is actually divided into several smaller districts. Emmanuel's place is in Palermo Hollywood. There is a cute street of restaurants, Fitzroy, very near to it. His building is halfway between Palermo Viejo, one of the trendiest areas in BA, and Las Canitas, a lovely, more relaxed area of restaurants and bars. We easily walked to dinner in Palermo Viejo and Las Canitas on several nights, just about a 15-minute walk in either direction. (Try Parilla Los Cholas in Las Canitas for a delicious, inexpensive dinner with the locals.) 

The apartment has plenty of room, but the duplex set-up makes it feel cozy. There is a lovely surprise when you turn out the lights upstairs. 

The air conditioning worked great and there is a little safe to use. 

One note... I have stayed in a lot of Airbnbs and always pick places with 5-star cleanliness ratings. I was surprised that this place has 5-stars for cleanliness. I might give it 3.5 or 4. The bathroom was very clean, as was the bed and the linens. However, the floors and some of the surfaces were dusty and there was a lot of hair around. I dropped something by the bed and wished that I hadn't looked under it. There was at least an inch of hair and dust. Overall, I would say that the apartment is clean in a general way, but that it definitely wasn't spotless. I would still stay at this place again, but I would have appreciated a heads-up to expect this before I arrived.
Great apartment, just as listed. Kitchen was stocked with everything you could need. Would certainly return.

This is a really great apartment in a very convenient location (Metro access, close to the action in Palermo, restaurants). Emmanuel was a top notch host and an excellent communicator. A very cozy and safe place that is accurately represented in the pictures. We enjoyed our stay.

The place was great all around - lots of light, very spacious, quiet, close to metro and bustling area, great air conditioning, excellent shower, comfortable bed and tranquil balcony.  We'd definitely stay here again!

The apartment is exactly as advertised and feels soo homey. Location is great with excellent eateries in Palermo within walking distance. Emmanuel was a perfect host and always responded very fast. He gave very useful tips and provided myself with a Subte card and a mobile, both easily rechargeable. There was even a bottle of wine and a bottle of water in the fridge. I highly recommend Emmanuel's apartment.

Emmanuel is a fantastic host. My boyfriend and I spent a month in his Buenos Aires apartment and felt very at home there. On our first day, we were met by Emmanuel's sister-in-law who was very friendly. Communication with Emmanuel was always excellent and he was quick to respond to the couple of requests we had. 
The apartment itself is clean and pleasant. We enjoyed the neighbourhood and felt safe and comfortable there. It is close to supermarkets, restaurants and the subway. We especially liked that it is a 15 minute walk to the main parks in Palermo. Highly recommend the neighbourhood, apartment and especially the host.

We stayed in this gorgeous loft in beautiful Palermo. It was spotlesslessly clean, basics like coffee, sugar etch plus they put some bottled water in the fridge and some milk. Finally, a delightful bottle of Syrah. Great little advice sheet for all things you need to know including great eat spots. We stayed five nights and felt very relaxed and at home. Thank you Emmanuel
Emannuel foi atencioso e disponível. O apartamento é lindo, exatamente como nas fotos. Também gosti muito da localização: perto do metrô, supermercado e restaurantes. Minha experiência foi ótima!

O apartamento é exatamente igual as fotos! Tivemos uma estadia muito confortável, a localização é ótima, muito perto do metrô e de supermercados e o Emmanuel sempre foi muito atencioso.
Super recomendado!!!

Emmanuel era fuori città e pertanto non l'abbiamo incontrato. Nonostante ciò abbiamo potuto conttatarlo ed era sempre molto disponibile. La cognata ci ha aspettato al nostro arrivo. Siamo arrivati un po' in anticipo ed ho avvisato Emmanuel che ha a sua volta avvisato prontamente sua cognata, molto gentile da parte sua!
L'appartamento é molto bello e curato ed Emmanuel ha lasciato tutte le informazioni importanti come pure il telefono cellulare. Molto utile! Inoltre l'ubicazione dell'appartamento é perfetta per poter visitare Buenos Aires giacché é molto vicino al metro ed alle fermate dei bus. Ci sono pure molte possibilità per fare la spesa e di fronte c'é una lavanderia.
Emmanuel was a great host and the apartment super nice. Anytime again.

We stayed for almost a week at Emmanuel's apartment. It was the first time we used Airbnb and the experience was so good that we will do it again. 
The apartment is as described on the website and the additional information provided in the apartment and with the booking confirmation is incredibly helpful. The location is fantastic and it is easy to explore Palermo by foot and other parts of Buenos Aires by public transport or by taxi.
 Emmanuel went out of his way to accommodate us and he allowed us very generously to check out late. Valeria, his sister, and his father were very helpful when we arrived and stayed in touch with us during our stay. 
The modern and cozy apartment is close to fantastic restaurants and great shopping. It was exactly what we were looking for.

The apartment is in a beautiful, modern building in Palermo. It's very close to the Palermo Subte station as well as other neat attractions, like the botanical gardens and zoo. The apartment itself is a very open and sunny space that has everything you need. Emmanuel was a terrific host. He has a very helpful information sheet prepared for guests (recommendations on where to eat, recommendations for cabs, etc.), and went out of his way to help me when my bag was lost. I'd HIGHLY recommend this apartment based on the space alone, but the location and the host made it even more enjoyable. Thanks, Emmanuel!

Emmanuel s apartment is better than the description ...
It has everything you need. A beautiful place full of sun during the day.
It is very well located , on a neighborhood that has everything, ( train station, bus station, supermarkets,restaurants, café) but in the same time it is very calm during the night.
Emmanuel and his sister in law Geraldine are very helpful , and by the time that I had a problem , they came in ten minutes to help me.
It is high high recommended as a place.

I would love to be back
Thanks Emmanuel
Great place, everything was just as described. Everything was clean and communication was easy. Lovely neighborhhod with many bars and restaurants!

Great location, tidy and comfortable apartment. Emmanuel was super communicative, left us milk and water, and had clear directions for everything. We visited in the summer and found the bedroom a little warm, likely due to the position of the AC and location of the necessary shades (apt gets a ton of light). Loved the juice press to make our own OJ in the morning. Didn't love that you needed a key to get out of the front door

Emanuel respond all our request. The neighborhood  was according whit our expectations.
The apartment was nice, as it looks in the pictures.
I would recommend it to people.

Emmanuel was a great host. Upon arrival there was someone there to meet us and tell us about the neighborhood and tips for the city in general.  The area was amazing.  We discussed possibly living there in the future.

The apartment was perfectly located near restaurants, cafes, shops, metro. It was very clean and looks just like the pics. It's a nice building and feels very safe. We will likely stay here again the next time we are in Buenos Aires. 

Emmanuel checked in daily to make sure we had everything we needed and even ordered a cab for us to the airport.  I highly recommend this place for a couple visiting Buenos Aires.
My experience was very smooth. The place is just as described. Great location.
Host made of feel welcome. Provided tips for getting around city and places to go. Someone was there to greet us when we arrived and Emmanuel checked up on us during the week.

It was our second stay in the apartment and we still love the place.
Good location near subway, shops and of course all the restaurants and bars. Everything is clean, wifi ok, bathroom with shower ok, clean and safe building...apartment is like you can see on the pictures. Emmanuel is a good host and gives quick response.

Wery convenient location. Safe neighborhood , close to metro.
For daily needs close shopping places like grocery, express Carrefour 
Nice decorated and clean apartment

It was all excellent.
The apartment and neighborhood was great.

We had a great stay. Emmanuel was very helpful with things like letting us leave our suitcases in his apartment after checkout. Internet was fast. Apt is as per photos in a good area.

I can verify all the other positive reviews left by other travelers. Would stay here again. Thanks

My stay in Buenos Aires was excellent! The apartment is great, it has everything you need, it is clean and comfortable. The area, Palermo Hollywood, is really nice with a lot of shops and bars close by. It's easy to travel around town because the metro and bus stops are near by. Emmanuel is an excellent host. He reacts promptly to questions and is very helpfull.

Emmanuel's place is a great flat in a perfect neighborhood! His communication and friendliness were also superb. What really made this place stand out though are the details provided by the host. The cellphone, the coffee and milk, and other little things added up to make my stay absolutely perfect! I would recommend Emmanuel's flat to anyone who wants to feel at home in Buenos Aires.

Stayed in this apartment for a recent visit to Buenos Aires. The unit was clean, in very good condition, in a secure new building at the heart of the Palermo Hollywood area. I was able to walk to my meetings (in Palermo) and to a nearby subway station to go to microcentro area. There are various grocery shops and restaurants nearby as well. Emmanuel was a very welcoming host who went out of his way to deliver the keys to the apartment and to make sure my stay was enjoyable. Overall very satisfied with the experience, the service of the host and the apartment itself.

Wonderful experience in Buenos Aires, the apartment was beautiful and air conditioned, with great stuff and commodity like stereo and kitchen. We were also be able to host a little party for the "revellion 2014" with our friend in BA.
The apartment was also close to public transport and natural park in Palermo Barrio!
I'm looking forward to come back soon and stay in Emmanuel's apartement!

The apartment was exactly how it was showned at the website. Great location. Check in hour extremely flexible, fact that helped me a lot.

Definitely I'd recommend anyone to stay here.

l'appartamento é molto carino, in ottima posizione . abbiamo avuto un problema di mancanza di elettricità e acqua, a causa di una crisi generale a buenos aires, e emmanuel è stato di aiuto portandoci delle candele e delle bottiglie di acqua. ottimo posto, se dovessi tornare a buenos aires lo chiamerò di nuovo!

Adoramos o apartamento que é bem localizado mum predio agradável. Apartamento limpo, cheiroso, organizado, bem iluminado e atende todas as necessidades e mais. Apreciamos muito todas as pequenas atenções tais como deixar uma garrafa de vinho e um cellular com chip argentino a disposição. Muito recomendado, pretendemos voltar!

Emmanuel's apartment is very well located, clean, cozy and bright. There are some details that distinguish the host and Emmanuel was very careful taking care of them. Besides all the great aspects that we can see, the apartment has a great vibe that you can feel only when stay there. Thanks, Emmanuel and her sister-in-law, Geraldine, that received us! It was amazing!

First time ever using airbnb. We have been travelling around south America for 2 Month using a combination of hotels and hostels. Since we were staying in Buenos Aires for several nights we decided to give airbnb a go. The price was cost of a shared hostel room. Airbnb is definitely a great option it meant we could stretch out and enjoy ourselves with some privacy without having to fork out for a hotel. As for Emmanuel's place, it was fantastic. Conveniently located in Palmero Hollywood with only a short walk to the nightlight (and boy is it a nightlife - open early the next day every day). The apartment is a lovely double story one bedroom apartment, with own kitchen and fantastic balcony. Emmanuel had his sister in law waiting for us with the key when we arrived and it was as simple as that. Thanks for a great stay!

We had a very nice stay in the apartment, we love this place. Located in palermo hollywood with a lot of restaurants and bars but not too busy. Bakery, supermarket and subte are only some steps away, try Leble and Oui Oui for breakfast or brunch and have lunch at Cocina Paradiso awesome ! The host Emmanuel was great,  always quick to respond and very helpfull, yes next time we visit BA we come back...Thank you Emmanuel for everything, you made our stay perfect !

The place is located in a very nice area in Palermo Holliwood which is less Soho than Palermo hand I like it). The apparent is quite, a lot of air and light. Close around you find bars and restaurant. I really did enjoy my stay. The apartment is exactly like it is on the picture. 
Ok a comment is usefuls only if it stresses also the negative points and as you will read there are not important.
A bulbe was missing in the kitchen (!!!)
The dog af the guy living in front was left alone one day and it let know it to the street
The guy next door did not find the button to ow the volume on it's tv on friday night.
6 glasses are better than 4.
As you read my general impression is excellent and, personally, I will come back. The niece of Emmanuel opened the door. Which nice and cool. They let me a bottle of wine as a welcoming present which is nice. A good place where to be. Pierre

It is my second time in Emmanuel's apartment.
Everything is PERFECT
Emmanuel is a perfect host
I strongly reccomend this place, for business trip or holiday trip

Emmanuel's apartment looks exactly like it does in the photos - bright, spacious, modern and uncluttered. I really enjoyed the location - close enough to the bus and subte stops on Santa Fe so that trips to other parts of the city were easy, and only a short walk to the nearby shops and restaurants of Palermo and Belgrano. (Santa Fe also provided many helpful resources such as a large grocery store, pharmacies and an excellent bakery only a block or two away.) There is no doorman for the building but security is careful, with a good lock system on both the apt door and the building door, plus 24-hr camera com on the entrance. Due to the cool spring weather I didn't use the little balcony but it would be a definite asset in warmer months. A big thank you to Emmanuel and his family for their good communication throughout and fast response to any inquiries. I really appreciated the basics stocked in the fridge - especially having arrived as I did during a 3-day rain storm.  I definitely recommend this apt for a pleasant stay in BA!

The stay in Emmanuel's apartment was just perfect. It is at least as good as the pictures suggest, very clean and comfortable. It is located in the best part of Buenos Aires, surrounded by a large number of nice cafes and restaurants. I could also check in in the early morning which was very convenient.

Lovely, airy flat in great location in Palermo Hollywood.  Few mins walk to Subte station, and lots of great restaurants and cafés in the neighbourhood. Flat was well-equipped, and Emmanuel provided wine, juice and milk when we arrived.

Emmanuel's apartment is incredible. Location is excellent (close to the bars, but quiet enough to be tranquil when you need it). The two floor layout makes great use of the space, and the giant windows make the space feel much larger than it really is. Clean, luxurious and with all the amenities you would want for a real porteño experience. Would stay there again in a heartbeat. Thanks Emmanuel!
Great apartment. Fast Wifi. Check in and check out easy and Emmanuel and friends friendly and helpful for getting in. Thanks!

It was my first time in Buenos Aires - and I was there one week for business.

The apartment is amazing: absolutly perfect if you are there for business: elegant place, WIFI, mobile for phone call in Argentina and SAFETY BOX!!!!!

The neigthborhood is nice and safe

I had easy communication with Emmanuel, he is a great host, and I definitly suggest this place

I started my trip in BA, and arrived to Emmanuel's place direct from the airport.
that was a great start for my trip, the place was great, min. walk from the center of Palermo which i found, the best area to spend my evenings.
Emmanuel took care, welcomed me nice, and gave some good advise. 

I recommend this place for everyone!

Laura and I had the most fantastic stay at Emmanuel's apartment.  The place is clean, spacious and overall excellent for a week or longer stay.  Emmanuel greeted us at the apartment and was extremely kind and helpful emailing us throughout the week to check up on us.  I would highly both the host and apartment for any stay in BA.

We had a wonderful stay in Emmanuel's apartment. It was a perfect location to explore BA and spend lazy mornings eating medialunas and drinking coffee on the balcony of this bright and cozy apartment. It was such a kind and helpful gesture to have wine waiting for us, as well as eggs, bread and butter. The water pressure in the bathroom was the best I experienced in South America and very welcome. Emmanuel was very accommodating and kind. Would recommend.
